author: Special Correspondent
text:
A total of about 14,600 children in the age group of 0-5 will be covered under pulse polio campaign to be held on January 17.

In a release here on Thursday, E. Vallavan, District Collector, said the children would be administered polio drops at 70 centres. The second phase of the campaign will be on February 21, the release added. — Special Correspondent
title: Pulse Polio
